title: Congresswoman Spanberger on North Korea
itunes:title: Congresswoman Spanberger on North Korea
description:
Kevin spoke with Matt Gorman, Vice President at Targeted Victory & Former NRCC Communications Director, Julie Roginsky, Democratic Strategist, and Congresswoman Abigail Spanberger. They discussed President Trump's meeting with China's President Xi, his visit to North Korea, Huawei, and the 2020 elections.

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
content:encoded:
